findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: The Solidity compiler version is not specified or is prone to changes between builds.
findings.contract: DividendTokenWithAntibot.sol, IUniswapV2Factory.sol, IUniswapV2Router01.sol, DividendTokenDividendTracker.sol, SafeMathInt.sol, SafeMathUint.sol, IterableMapping.sol

findings.title: Owner can set liquidity buy/sell fees up to 20%
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to set liquidity buy and sell fees up to 20%, which could lead to potential manipulation or exploitation.

findings.title: Owner can set marketing buy/sell fees up to 20%
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to set marketing buy and sell fees up to 20%, which could potentially lead to unfair or malicious fee structures.

findings.title: Owner can set reward buy/sell fees up to 20%
findings.description: The owner has the capability to set reward buy/sell fees up to 20%, which may lead to unintended consequences or potential manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can set max wallet limit
findings.description: The owner has the capability to set a maximum wallet limit with an amount greater than 0.

findings.title: Owner can set max tx limit
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to set a maximum transaction limit with an amount greater than 0.
